short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes Sign In popup, Ads, Promoted & sponsored contents and Related Answers from Quora.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of the endless Sign-in pop-ups, Distracting Advertisements, Promoted & Sponsored contents, and Related answers cluttering your Quora experience? Say goodbye to the noise with Simplify Quora.

Install the extension and watch as it effortlessly removes all the unwanted elements from your Quora pages, giving you a clean and focused browsing experience.

What if you change your mind and want to see Related answers again? Easy - just click on the extension to reveal a convenient popup menu where you can toggle specific options on or off.

Take back control of your browsing with Simplify Quora. Install today and enjoy Quora the way you want it.

Happy browsing!
